channel.title: Cure Right Wounds
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Cure Right Wounds" - no effect today :(

item.title: Re: Cure Right Wounds
item.content:encoded:
This Hand of Mine
Trainer

* Doughman

Effect

* +100 Bingo Damage, Bingos self
* +100 Style Points

Notes

* You cannot use a Cure Right Wounds to get rid of the bingo on yourself if you use this jutsu to bingo someone. <=== ahhh, not find at CRW page :(

tq

item.title: Re: Cure Right Wounds
item.content:encoded: Bingo items dont work on self bingos from This Hand of Mine.

item.title: Cure Right Wounds
item.content:encoded:
i did bingo my self ( using doughman jutsu - this hand of mine ).
and even i try used CRW 3 times, but still no effect.

CRW can not used for cure self bingo ?

tq
